医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新抗原疫苗的进步为个性化癌症治疗带来了希望癌症治疗的传奇以对这种具有复杂性和适应性的疾病的有效性的不懈追求为标志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Advancements-in-neoantigen-vaccines-offer-hope-for-personalized-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Advancements-in-neoantigen-vaccines-offer-hope-for-personalized-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2dd269d-6f6f-4208-b05a-d07e4be6901e Mon, 19 Aug 2024 13:56:44 -0400 Advancements in neoantigen vaccines offer hope for personalized cancer therapy
肥胖引起的脂肪炎症促进细胞外囊泡分泌东芬兰大学的新研究通过探索人类脂肪细胞分泌的微小膜颗粒（称为细胞外囊泡），揭示了肥胖与炎症之间的关联机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Obesity-induced-adipose-inflammation-boosts-extracellular-vesicle-secretion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Obesity-induced-adipose-inflammation-boosts-extracellular-vesicle-secretion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=469a2797-6d7d-4424-8b4c-8413c9605f20 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 13:52:04 -0400 Obesity-induced adipose inflammation boosts extracellular vesicle secretion
研究人员在海葵中发现了多能干细胞的可能候选者海葵 Nematostella vectensis 可能是永生的。维也纳大学 Ulrich Technau 领导的发育生物学家利用分子遗传学方法，首次在海葵中发现了多能干细胞的可能候选者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Researchers-identify-possible-candidates-for-multipot-stem-cells-in-the-sea-anemone.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Researchers-identify-possible-candidates-for-multipot-stem-cells-in-the-sea-anemone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf70efad-46a0-424e-9097-dc883aa54ef8 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 13:46:37 -0400 Researchers identify possible candidates for multipotent stem cells in the sea anemone
州 COVID-19 疫苗要求 2021 年提高医护人员的疫苗接种率研究人员调查了各州对医护人员的 COVID-19 疫苗接种要求与他们的疫苗接种率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/State-COVID-19-vaccine-mandates-increased-vaccine-uptake-among-healthcare-workers-in-2021.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/State-COVID-19-vaccine-mandates-increased-vaccine-uptake-among-healthcare-workers-in-2021.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88cf60b5-642c-4705-b080-21505d71acec Mon, 19 Aug 2024 10:35:00 -0400 State COVID-19 vaccine mandates increased vaccine uptake among healthcare workers in 2021
科罗拉多州 100 美元的自付额上限可改善糖尿病药物依从性和健康结果研究人员研究了科罗拉多州 100 美元的共付额上限与自我支出、药物依从性以及糖尿病相关合并症的医疗服务使用之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Colorados-24100-copay-cap-improves-diabetes-medication-adherence-and-health-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Colorados-24100-copay-cap-improves-diabetes-medication-adherence-and-health-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f50efaaa-8bdf-453a-b6da-f5e7df4c2430 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 09:35:00 -0400 Colorado's $100 copay cap improves diabetes medication adherence and health outcomes
Lexogen 推出针对鱼类的 RiboCop rRNA 去除试剂盒RNA 测序技术领域的领导者 Lexogen 很高兴地宣布推出 RiboCop rRNA 去除试剂盒（鱼类），这是一种专用解决方案，可通过有效去除总 RNA 样本中不需要的核糖体 RNA (rRNA) 来促进鱼类转录组分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Lexogen-Launches-RiboCop-rRNA-Depletion-Kit-for-Fish-Species.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Lexogen-Launches-RiboCop-rRNA-Depletion-Kit-for-Fish-Species.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e172db5-9b86-47bf-ad3f-a4946748916a Mon, 19 Aug 2024 09:07:00 -0400 Lexogen Launches RiboCop rRNA Depletion Kit for Fish Species
新型便携式生物传感器可能彻底改变家庭心力衰竭筛查心力衰竭是全世界死亡的主要原因，对于无法获得医疗设施的人来说尤其致命。因此，一组研究人员的目标是将心力衰竭筛查从实验室带到家庭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/New-portable-biosensor-could-revolutionize-heart-failure-screening-at-home.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/New-portable-biosensor-could-revolutionize-heart-failure-screening-at-home.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8df1ef3-8b29-4dab-8c2f-302303dfb253 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 08:58:49 -0400 New portable biosensor could revolutionize heart failure screening at home
新声明强调护士在管理中风后心理社会健康方面的作用护士在帮助患者应对中风后的情感和社会健康挑战或心理社会健康方面发挥着关键作用，改善心理社会需求的筛查和评估对于提供最佳的患者护理至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/New-statement-highlights-nurses-role-in-managing-psychosocial-health-after-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/New-statement-highlights-nurses-role-in-managing-psychosocial-health-after-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2d55c0d-9b24-48c4-817f-e5ee4b8c0639 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 08:27:39 -0400 New statement highlights nurses' role in managing psychosocial health after stroke
利用细菌进行组织工程的突破由 Alireza Dolatshahi-Pirouz 领导的丹麦技术大学研究小组最近通过利用细菌的治愈能力，在组织工程和细胞治疗方面发现了新领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Breakthrough-in-tissue-engineering-using-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Breakthrough-in-tissue-engineering-using-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e032f243-47dd-4ced-8d28-34061629c0b7 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 08:11:38 -0400 Breakthrough in tissue engineering using bacteria
研究显示，围绝经期女性患抑郁症和躁狂症的风险增加探索为什么女性在围绝经期期间患躁狂症和重度抑郁症的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Perimenopausal-women-face-increased-risk-of-depression-and-mania-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Perimenopausal-women-face-increased-risk-of-depression-and-mania-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77879db8-f18c-4f46-8672-f088cedfe2bf Mon, 19 Aug 2024 08:02:00 -0400 Perimenopausal women face increased risk of depression and mania, study reveals
